alert.note: Alert for Oconto; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:26PM CDT until May 07 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MENOMINEE...NORTHERN WAUPACA...SOUTHERN OCONTO AND SHAWANO COUNTIES... At 1125 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Embarrass, or 13 miles west of Shawano, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Shawano, Clintonville, Pulaski, Gillett, Wittenberg, Embarrass, Navarino Wildlife Area, Legend Lake, Keshena and Belle Plaine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to urban flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
